name: Ephemeral (Quirky Squid Studios)
description:
You are a robot alone in a wasteland on a journey to find purpose. Ephemeral is a puzzle game made in 3 days for Mini Jam 73.

macOS Catalina Users:

If you are struggling to run the game, you might need to change permissions. Try running the following command from the terminal in the folder containing the app:

sudo chmod a+x "Ephemeral_fixed.app"/Contents/MacOS/*
